long_description: The lightweight SealSkinz Thin Ankle-Length socks feature waterproof, highly breathable membranes that'll keep your feet dry and comfortable when you're wearing light hikers in wet conditions. Seamless, close-fitting knit construction is ideal for light hiking and trail-running shoes; designed to come up to just above your ankles. Stretchy nylon/elastane exteriors are lined with soft merino wool/nylon/elastane for great comfort next to skin; merino wool blend wicks moisture away from your feet. Elastic insteps and panels by the Achilles tendons provide support. SealSkinz Thin Ankle-Length socks deliver lightweight cushioning. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The lightweight SealSkinz Thin Ankle-Length socks feature waterproof, highly breathable membranes that'll keep your feet dry and comfortable when you're wearing light hikers in wet conditions.
